mapper.select:
SELECT T01.SEQ , T01.NAME , T01.TELNO , T01.EMAIL , T01.SKILL1 , T01.SKILL2 , T01.SKILL3 , T01.IMPORT AS IMPORT1 , T01.BUSINESS , T01.BIRTH , T01.AREA1 , T01.AREA2 , T01.GRADE , T01.LICENSE , T01.FIRST_STATUS , T01.NOW_STATUS , T01.PROJECT , T01.FINISH_DATE , CASE WHEN LENGTH(T01.MEMO) > 35 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(T01.MEMO,1, 35), '...') ELSE T01.MEMO END AS MEMO FROM TPERSON T01 WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY T01.SEQ DESC

SELECT T01.SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(T01.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DT , DATE_FORMAT(T01.EDIT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EDIT_DT , T01.SKILL1 , T01.SKILL2 , T01.SKILL3 , T01.NAME , T01.TELNO , T01.EMAIL , T01.BIRTH , T01.FIRST_STATUS , T01.NOW_STATUS , T01.BUSINESS , T01.IMPORT , T01.GRADE , T01.MEMO , T01.FINISH_DATE , T01.PROJECT , T01.AREA1 , T01.AREA2 , T01.LICENSE FROM TPERSON T01 WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
